import React from 'react' import {Container, Card, Col, Row, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import AdmissionApply from './AdmissionApply' import { getCurrentUserDetails } from '../auth' import { EditCourse } from './EditCourse' const CourseCard = ({course, deleteCourse }) => { const {id, name, description, duration, institute} =course const role = getCurrentUserDetails().role const handleDeleteCourse=(courseId)=>{ return deleteCourse(courseId) } return ( Diploma in {name} By {institute.name} {description} Duration : {duration} Semester { role === "ROLE_USER" ? ( ) : (
) } ) } export default CourseCard
